channel.title: Problem With Cache [PI]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gotqQ.png[/img]
Once I start my client, it always does this, even if I have cache downloaded... If they aren't downloaded, they get downloaded on my client and it does that after.
How can I fix that ? This only takes more time to load and it could be erased.
Thanks. Base: Hybrid PvP Client V3

item.title: Problem With Cache [PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_Hope_I I Hope I
item.description:
@I_Hope_I wrote:

Yeah this problem is weird. My friend had the same. I’d help him if I’d know the error
